text.div:
ReferralCategory

Identifies the degree of intention/authorization associated with the request

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/referralcategory defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
proposal Proposal The referral request represents a suggestion or recommendation that a referral be made.
plan Plan The referral request represents an intention by the author to make a referral, but no actual referral has yet been made/authorized.
request Request This is an actual referral request which, when active, will have the authorizations needed to allow it to be actioned.

name: ReferralCategory
description: Identifies the degree of intention/authorization associated with the request

concept.definition: The referral request represents a suggestion or recommendation that a referral be made.
The referral request represents an intention by the author to make a referral, but no actual referral has yet been made/authorized.
This is an actual referral request which, when active, will have the authorizations needed to allow it to be actioned.
